name: Constancy: Roa
blurb: Inspired by games like Mega Man X, but with more evolved AI and a focus on memorable boss battles. Help Roa adapt to a new world.

rewards.reward: Thanks for donating, backers of this tier will receive a digital sketch of one of the characters.  Please specify which character you want.
Backers of this tier get a digital copy of this game's soundtrack, as well as the above sketch.

Awakening - Receive a digital, DRM free version of Constancy: Roa at a lower price!  This is at a limited number available.  Also receive a digital soundtrack and sketch of your favorite character!  From this tier on all backers will get special forum access!

Genesis - Standard edition digital copy of Constancy: Roa as well as soundtrack and sketch from the previous tiers.  Add $20 to your pledge for additional copies (limit 8).  From this tier on all backers will get special forum access!

Early Bird - Very Limited availability! This is a lower cost version of the Special Edition Constancy: Roa box. This includes the game, soundtrack, a full color manual, game box, poster, and book of secrets. This full color art book and information guide will be delivered one month after the rest for spoiler reasons. You also receive several sketches from previous rewards. Please specify the ones you want.

Re-birth - Limited availability!  This is a lower cost version of the Special Edition Constancy: Roa box. This includes the game, soundtrack, a full color manual, game box, poster, and book of secrets. This full color art book and information guide will be delivered one month after the rest for spoiler reasons.  You also receive several sketches from previous rewards.  Please specify the ones you want.

Mega: Special Edition Constancy: Roa box. This includes the game, soundtrack, a full color manual, game box, poster, and book of secrets, This full color art book and information guide will be delivered one month after the rest for spoiler reasons. You also receive several sketches from previous rewards.  Please specify which ones you want.
Last-Call: Receive a special Limited Edition of Constancy: Roa at a lower cost This contains everything the special edition has but also includes a T-Shirt and a special art print.
Gamma: Receive a special Limited Edition of Constancy: Roa.  This contains everything the special edition has but also includes a T-Shirt and a special art print.

Movie Star: A likeness of your choosing will be in a cinematic in Constancy: Roa you will also receive the Limited Edition from the previous tier.\r\nnote: We reserve the right to alter/change the characters based on copyright issues or other possible situations that may arise but we will run any changes by you.

World View: Create an NPC for Constancy: Roa's Base this NPC will be completely interactive and have it's own vocal dialogue that changes throughout the game.  Dialogue must fit the situation at the time.  In addition you will receive a Constancy: Roa Customized Edition box.  These limited edition boxes are customized to their owners containing your favorite preferences as the default your name on the box and the title screen as well as a selection of box art and disk art that you can choose from.  They also contain everything the Limited Edition has.  These will not be offered again after the Kickstarter!\r\nNote: Design, dialogue and character must fit the tone of a military installation within acceptable limits.  We reserve the right to alter/change the characters based on copyright issues or other possible situations that may arise but we will run any changes by you.

Sigma Reward: Create a hidden boss character for Constancy: Roa's Infinity Mode!  While playing in this mode sometimes you'll encounter completely new bosses now you can help us create one.  You will also recieve the customized edition!  \r\nNote: for this one especially we reserve the right to alter/change or deny boss ideas based on various reasoning such as copyright and other possible situations that may arise.  we will work with you to make a suitable neat looking boss for this mode as best we can.  This is a hidden boss so you cannot tell people about it till it's known as well.  Additionally you will recieve a customized Constancy: Roa figure.

Omega Reward:  We will personally hand you your copy of the game at a convention of your choosing. We'll also have a Roa cosplayer with us!  We'll hang out with you, answer your questions and generally have a a good time.  You won't have to pay for our plane ticket or anything of the sort!  You will also receive the Customized Edition from the last tier, a digital copy of the game to tide you over until we meet, and a Constancy: Roa figure\r\nNotes: Convention must be in the United States and near enough to you that you wouldn't require a flight yourself.

Omni Reward: You receive everything from all previous tiers, cinematic likeness, hub NPC, a boss character you help us to create and a Customized Edition of the game as well as an additional copy of the game.  You will also receive a customized Constancy: Roa figure of whichever character in it YOU want to see and VIP access in our forums!  For this much support we'd also like to meet you at Ohayacon!  We'll even fit the entire bill ourselves.  We'll pay for your plane ticket (round trip), lodging expenses, dinner and souvenirs for the three days of the convention.  You'll be our guest and we'll answer any questions you have.  We'll also have our Roa cos-player with us as well!
